1 #include "ros/node_handle.h"
2 #include "ros/rate.h"
3 #include <cmath>
4 #include <geometry_msgs/TransformStamped.h>
5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 #include <tf2/LinearMath/Quaternion.h>
7 #include <tf2_ros/transform_broadcaster.h>
8 
9 constexpr double NODE_RATE = 5.0;
10 
12 class tfPublisher {
13 
14 public:
15  tfPublisher(double x_min_val, double x_max_val, double angle_min_val, double angle_max_val)
16  : nh_(), pnh_("~") {
17  setAngleConstraints(angle_min_val, angle_max_val);
18  setRangeConstraints(x_min_val, x_max_val);
19 
20  pnh_.param<bool>("is_x_forward", is_x_forward_, true);
21  }
22 
23  void start() {
24  while (ros::ok()) {
25  broadcast();
26  }
27  }
28 
29 private:
30  void broadcast() {
31  double pos_x_value;
32  double angle_value;
33 
34  for (int i = 0, j = 0; j < step_count_; j++, i++) {
35  pos_x_value = x_min_ + x_increment_ * i;
36  angle_value = min_angle_ + angle_increment_ * j;
37 
38  /* ROS_INFO_THROTTLE(5, "Iteration %d. Pose x: %f, angle: %f", i, pos_x_value, angle_value); */
39  current_position_.setX(pos_x_value);
40  iterateBroadcating(current_position_, angle_value);
41  rate_.sleep();
42  }
43  }
44 
45  void setRangeConstraints(double in_x_min, double in_x_max) {
46  x_min_ = in_x_min;
47  x_max_ = in_x_max;
48  x_increment_ = (in_x_max - in_x_min) / step_count_;
49  }
50 
51  void setAngleConstraints(double in_min_angle, double in_max_angle) {
52  max_angle_ = in_max_angle;
53  min_angle_ = in_min_angle;
54  angle_increment_ = M_PI / 180;
55  step_count_ = abs((in_max_angle - in_min_angle)) / angle_increment_;
56  }
57 
58  void iterateBroadcating(const tf2::Vector3 &pose, double theta) {
59  static tf2_ros::TransformBroadcaster br;
60  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transformStamped;
61 
62  transformStamped.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
63  transformStamped.header.frame_id = base_frame_;
64  transformStamped.child_frame_id = object_frame_;
65 
66  transformStamped.transform.translation.x = pose.x();
67  transformStamped.transform.translation.y = pose.y();
68  transformStamped.transform.translation.z = pose.z();
69  tf2::Quaternion q;
70 
71  if (is_x_forward_) {
72  q.setRPY(0, 0, theta);
73  } else {
74  q.setRPY(theta, M_PI / 2, 0);
75  }
76 
77  transformStamped.transform.rotation.x = q.x();
78  transformStamped.transform.rotation.y = q.y();
79  transformStamped.transform.rotation.z = q.z();
80  transformStamped.transform.rotation.w = q.w();
81 
82  br.sendTransform(transformStamped);
83  }
84 
85 protected:
86  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
87  ros::NodeHandle pnh_;
88 
89  std::string base_frame_ = "base_link";
90  std::string object_frame_ = "object";
91  tf2::Vector3 current_position_ = {0, 0.3, 0};
92 
93  ros::Rate rate_ = ros::Rate(NODE_RATE);
94 
95  bool is_x_forward_;
96  double min_angle_;
97  double max_angle_;
98 
99  double x_min_;
100  double x_max_;
101 
102  double step_count_;
103 
104  double angle_increment_;
105  double x_increment_;
106 };
107 
108 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
109  ros::init(argc, argv, "tf_broacaster");
110 
111  double x_min = 1.0;
112  double x_max = 3.0;
113 
114  double angle_min = -M_PI;
115  double angle_max = M_PI;
116 
117  tfPublisher tfPub(x_min, x_max, angle_min, angle_max);
118  tfPub.start();
119 
120  return 0;
121 };
